title: Keynote: Futnani on engaging superpowers in MENA and beyond - TXF
summary: The article discusses the role of MENA ECAs in supporting the energy transition, the importance of energy transition deals in HSBC's portfolio, and the significance of new technology deals like green hydrogen in the region.
green_innovation: FALSE. The article does not focus on developing or implementing new technologies or processes to minimize negative environmental externalities of human activity.
